data.message: Why was my friends account blocked? He has also uploaded his ID about 20X with no prevailing success. He is not a fake profile and his entire picture albums of all 4 of his children are on his Facebook.  He is a loving father of 4 and Facebook should have contacted him prior to deleting his account. His wife is even listed on his account ad his spouse and if you looked at his profile you would know he is not a fake profile. He works hard and is a gym enthusiast he went from 305lbs last March to 238lbs now. Please unlock his account!

replies.message: We all told him don't put them up only on Facebook.  Yet he did! He said he apologizes to you for inconveniencing your life Ryan Osbon by wanting his children's photos. It was probably his ex that keeps reporting his fb!
Hey Josh. We disable Facebook accounts that violate our terms. Please visit the Help Center for more information: http://on.fb.me/1advRFV -Hailey
At least let him get his photos, that's actually kinda sad :/.
Though I guess that profile could be fake too, as it has little info on it either....
